Key Match Events: White nails career-high nine 3s, scores 33 as Bulls beat Knicks 139-126 after honoring Rose
Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 15 rebounds, and 12 assists
Kawhi Leonard made two clutch free throws to seal the win in overtime
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Lakers to win based on their recent performance
Coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
The duel between Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo was highlighted as the key matchup
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Vince Carter announced his retirement after the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: A power outage delayed the game by 30 minutes
This was the 100th meeting between the two rival teams
Others: The game itself was more or less meaningless

The sequence went exactly as I feared. We played OKC tough, they wore us down with their superior bench, Thibs played the starters a ton of minutes trying to get the win even though we are on a B2B on the road and we were so exhausted we lost to the Bulls too
